name: Commode (with Flip-up arm rest and Wheels are easy to lock and unlock)
description: Senior need mobility aids to support her day-to-day activities. Her current commode is faulty. She stays with her son who is diagnosed with mental health condition. Her daughter is a sole caregiver to both senior and her brother. Commode without pot is fine too.

contact.name: Lim Xiao Wei

name: motorised wheelchair
description: Elderly is staying in a rental flat and primary caregiver for her granddaughter(F/10). He has mobility difficulty and requires the assistance of a motorized wheelchair to commute safer with the limited assistance of his caregiver. He faces financial constraints and is unable to afford getting a wheelchair.(Xin mo)

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: Wheelchair battery
description: Client is a 49-year-old woman living with her wheelchair-bound husband (M/67). Client is unemployed and does not receive any financial support from her family. Her husband is retired, and they have been surviving on his monthly CPF payouts. Her husband’s battery for his motorised wheelchair is faulty and they have not been able to replace it due to financial constraints. A donation of a wheelchair battery will be greatly appreciated. Thank you. (Liyana)

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: Motorised Wheelchair
description: Single elderly male who is a stroke survivor with left side contractures of the past 7 years. He lives in a rental flat that has been infested with bed bugs. He is not on good terms with his CO-tenant and relies heavily on his motorised wheelchair to go out of home to avoid conflict at home. He needs to have the motorised wheelchair before fumigation can be done to his flat.

name: Elevating Footrest and Detachable Armrest Wheelchair
description: 8 years old child who was diagnosed with cancer had just undergone a surgery at the leg and requires a wheelchair with detachable armrest and an elevating footrest.

name: Motorized Wheelchair Needed for Elderly Client!
description: Client is an elderly woman with limited mobility. She is presently residing alone and is dependent on others when she utilizes her manual wheelchair. The motorized wheelchair will help her to regain her personal independence and enable her to fulfil her day-to-day needs and errands with more ease.

name: Adult Diapers
description:
The individual is currently bed-ridden and will require diapers to support with daily needs. 

The individual has limited financial support to provide expenses on her own and family members have other family commitments and are limited in their financial resources. 

The individual is looking for a donor who may support in the donation of adult diapers between November '21 to December '21.

name: COVID ART TEST KIT
description: We are appealing FOR A COVID 19 ART TEST KIT for a low income client who need to do ART TEST twice a week due to is part time status his company did not provide him with the kits and he have to fork up his own money to do so due to hs financial constrains is not able to do so

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Maggie Gan

name: Standard Q ART Test Kits (50x and more)
description:
For low income families with children ages between 5 - 18 years old.
With more testing require during the current phrase, the low income families are experiencing difficulties in affording more test kits, especially families with many children. Hence, need support in donations of Standard Q ART Test Kits. Donors can get in touch with me on delivering the test kits to our office at (20 Lengkok Bahru, Playground Block, #03-02, Singapore 159053). Thank you!

name: Diapers (Lifree)
description: Recently divorced elderly, 70 years old, requires assistance with getting diapers as she is unable to afford them on her own. Due to her recent change in marital status, she is no longer supported by her children or ex-husband, leaving her with rental and bill arrears. Hoping to find a donor who would be able to sponsor some adult diapers so she may alleviate costs for her medical needs. She prefers Lifree brand as it does not cause discomfort to her.

name: Electric countertop oven
description: Clt F27 is mom to 4 young kids (3 lower primary, 1 in infant care) and hopes to do baking for her kids. Husband is low wage earner and clt is doing contract part time job to provide for their family who lives in a rental flat.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Bukit Batok
contact.name: Christina Lim

name: Fridge
description: Single mom with young daughter needs a small fridge as their previous donated fridge was spoilt. At present family is managing with canned food and maggi noodles due to the lack of fridge for fresh food. Mother is unable to work due to health issues

name: Bathing Water Heater
description:
Client is a retired 68 year old single man. He is dependent on a CPF monthly payout of less than $1k per month and owes close to $40k in credit card debt. He is requesting for a new* bathing water heater for the 1-room rental flat he is moving into. Secondhand items would also be much appreciated, thanks so much! 

*New: To minimise likelihood of it malfunctioning in the near future, which will incur repair costs

contact.name: Sarah Loh

name: Toploader Washing Machine
description:
Client is a retired 68 year old single man. He is dependent on a CPF monthly payout of less than $1k per month and owes close to $40k in credit card debt. He is requesting for a new* toploader washing machine for the 1-room rental flat he is moving into. In terms of load, it only has to be sufficient for two single men.

*New: To minimise likelihood of it malfunctioning in the near future, which will incur repair costs

contact.name: Sarah Loh

name: Working Laptop
description: 30-year-old lady is facing financial constrains and is hoping to sign up for SG United Traineeship. She would need a laptop to participate in this traineeship and sign up for it.

name: Television
description: Client is a single, elderly male living alone, unemployed. He used to spend time watching TV, but his TV set spoilt and wished for a new TV for his engagement needs.

name: Stove with cabinet
description: Family with 6 children requires stove with cabinet. Their one room flat caught fire. One child in the family has cancer. Father is the sole breadwinner and family has their financial constraints.

name: Refrigerator
description: The client's refrigerator have not been in working condition for a week and the family would require a replacement. Interested donors please contact reubenyue@carecorner.org.sg. Thank you.

name: Fridge
description: Family of 9 needs medium sized fridge as home caught fire today and current fridge cant be used. Family lives in 2 room flat. Mother is recuperating from recent miscarriage and one of her children diagnosed with cancer.

name: Washing machine
description: Family of 9 needs 9kg washing machine as home caught fire today and current washing machine cant be used. Family lives in 2 room flat. Mother is recuperating from recent miscarriage and one of her children diagnosed with cancer.

name: Refrigerator
description: Client is a middle-aged man who is an amputee, a wheelchair user, and is unfit for employment for life. He needs a new refrigerator before moving into his public rental flat. He needs the fridge to put his medication (ie, insulin) other than food. The fridge allows the insulin to be stored at the right temperature in the long term.

name: Microwave
description: Client is a single mother and has 3 school going children. She is caring for her 70 year old father as well. Client has to work night shift so that she can care for her children in the daytime. Client is struggling financially and she does not have enough funds to purchase a microwave. As client is from a Muslim family, new microwave is preferable.

name: Oven (Halal)
description: Client is looking for an oven to allow her to polish her baking skills so that she can set up her own home-based business in future. The client has heart conditions and job options are limited for her.

name: Dryer
description: Family of 3 with 2 school-going children require a clothes dryer.

name: Fridge (2 or 3 door, top and bottom)
description: Client (F/48), lives alone at home. Require new fridge donation, as current fridge has been damaged. She likes to cook and having a new fridge will help to ensure her groceries are fresh. Will like to have a fridge that is 2 or 3 doors. Do contact me at 8628 1578. Thanks!

contact.name: Quek Liu Ting

name: Fridge (2 or 3 door, top and bottom)
description:
Client, living in rental flat alone, aged 48, requires fridge at home. She likes to cook, but her previous 2nd hand fridge has broke down. 

Will like to seek for new fridge donation. 2 or 3 doors preferred. Kindly contact me at 8628 1578.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Quek Liu Ting

name: Front loading Washing Machine
description:
An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC), Mdm See Mei Ting, was diagnosed with end stage cancer. She is frail, has chronic back issues and is unable to ambulate well. Mdm See still hand washes her clothes, which worsens her back issues. 
 
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking a donation of a front-loading washing machine to aid Mdm See. 
   
If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please contact Tan Jin Le at 8828 6171. We appreciate it if the donor could deliver the items to the client’s home directly at Blk 75 Bedok North Road. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

name: Vacuum cleaner
description: Client is living in a 2 room HDB rental with her husband, son, grandson and two young granddaughter. Her daughter and son-in-law are incarcerated thus, she and her husband have to care for their grandchildren. Client is the sole breadwinner of the family as her husband is unwell and also has to be the caregiver for their grandchildren. Client is struggling financially. Client requested for a vacuum cleaner to assist with her cleaning of her home.

name: Clothes Dryer
description: Organisation helping pregnant women with unsupported pregnancies looking for a dryer for their premises.

name: handheld vacuum cleaner
description: Single unemployed mother with 3 children living in a 2-room rental flat. Requesting for a handheld vacuum cleaner for convenience in cleaning her home.

name: Daikin mc30vvm-h air purifier (or similar)
description: Client is diagnosed with multiple myeloma and is on treatment. She's advised that her space has to be clean and clutter free as she is going for her bone marrow transplant soon. Thus, having an air purifier will help her in keeping her environment clean. However, as she's financially needy, she is unable to afford it.

name: Hot & Cold Water Dispenser
description:
Client is a household of 6 family members. 
The sole-income earner takes on a low pay and the family is dependable on SSO Comcare financial assistance.
The main caregiver is facing health issues and is unable to support the family's financial situation apart from the caregiving of the children. 
Having to struggle with basic needs, the family do not have additional finances to afford the purchase a hot & cold water dispenser.

name: Repair Electrical Appliances
description:
Client is an elderly lady with disabilities, wheelchair-bound with 40 year old daughter as primary caregiver.
 Daughter is required to support client with her activities for daily living, including showering and ambulating, and also has to take care of the household.
 Daughter is unemployed due to client's care needs and family is reliant on SSO assistance. Family has expressed that their washing machine is leaking water and their refridgerator has stopped working, and they are unable to afford the repairs. They are hope to be able to repair these appliances.

name: WE Cinema & 18 Chefs Gift Cards for Family Bonding
description: Single mother of 3 children (16yo, 12yo and 6yo) has been working hard to provide for her family as well as bring her children up. Her children have grown to be responsible and caring individuals, to much credits to client's continued efforts and sacrifices for her family. This is a worker-initiated request, to seek WE Cinema and 18 Chefs gift cards - as an avenue for the family to celebrate family time together ,and for the children to show their appreciation to their mother. Interested donors, please contact worker (Shiyan) at 8554-8219, or shiyan@frcsfsc.sg.

name: 10 X 10kg FairPrice Thai Hom Mali rice
description: We are requesting for 10 packets of 10kg FairPrice Thai Hom Mali rice as we cook 3 meals a day for our residents from Monday to Saturday. The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. We have a total of about 100 residents and staff staying in at our premises.

The hospital dietician had recommend client to take milk supplement RESOURCE® 2.0 LIQUID (200ML) and 24 bottles cost about $100+. However, the family is currently facing financial difficulties and donation of the milk will greatly ease the financial and caregiving burden as well.

name: Resource Fruit Flavored Beverage (Orange)
description: Pt, 70 years old, bilateral amputee, living alone in a HDB 1 room rental flat. She has poor appetite and assessed to be malnutritioned by our dietitian. Was unable to tolerate other supplements but appears receptive towards fruit resource supplement. Although pt has been on fruit resource for the past 4 months, meal intake still remains poor and blood test results suggest that she would still require the fruit based supplement.    Apart from daily expenses, children are unable to afford additional expenses because they are low income earners and staying in a 1 room rental flat. Would like to seek donation of 2 months' supply (48 packets) of Resource Fruit Flavoured Beverage (orange flavour)

name: Nan Supreme Infant Formula
description: Young family has a 1 year old son and just delivered another baby last month. Children's father is 22 years old and enlisted into NS early this year. Infant formula required: Stage 1 and State 2.

Christmas hamper collection drive. We are preparing to pack and distribute 40 sets of hampers to stay-alone elderly, or low-income families as part of our year-end festivities. Please contact Jiemei @ 81266854 or Clarissa @ 91271945 for more information.

Items required:
Hand soap
Dishwashing liquid
Dish sponge
Gloves
Dettol wet wipes

name: Stage 4 Dugro Milk Formula (2-3 bottles)
description:
Client (28/M) resided with his wife (34/F) and 2 sons (3/M and 3/M). Client is currently employed as a food delivery man and wife employed as a part-time clinic assistant. Family is also supported by SSO@Woodlands for ComCare Assistance but still struggles to cope due to monthly repayment of debs previously incurred. Client's income was recently further impacted due to severe eczema experienced that led him to be hospitalized, affecting his ability to maintain employment. Client wishes to support the family in greater capacity but identifies limitations in doing so currently due to his mental health concerns. Client is unable to acquire support from her family of origin due to history of strained relationships. Client shared on family's attempt in coping with difficulties encountered but faces financial difficulties, especially in the purchasing of sons' diapers. We would like to seek donations for 4 Drypers/Huggies diapers of size XL and 2 Drypers/Huggies diapers of XXL for the two sons in addressing their sanitary needs and Pediasure Milk Formula and Stage 4 Dugro Milk Formula for children's development consumption due to family's financial struggles. name: 3 x Drypers Size M, 3 x Drypers Size XL, 3 x Drypers Size XXL
description:
Client is a mother of 7 (F/15, F/9, F/8, M/7, F/5, F3, M/newborn). 
Client and her husband currently live in a 1-room-1-hall with F/9, F/8, M/7, F/5, F3, M/newborn. 
Client was previously unable to work due to gestational hypertension, and presently, she is the primary caregiver for the newborn. 
In addition, she underwent a cesarean section (c-section) when she gave birth on 30th August 2021, and is currently unable to do strenuous activities. Her husband is currently employed as a food delivery rider on a part time basis, working only for a few hours each night as he helps client out in the day. As such, the family are limited in their financial resources and are unable to support the milk and diaper needs for F/5, F/3 and M/newborn.

description: A blended family of 4 where there are 2 children, aged 11 and 16 months staying in a 1 room rental flat. As the 16 month old boy is a very active child, the baby gate will help to ensure his safety by not allowing him to enter the kitchen without adult supervision. This will help parents juggle the toddler's needs at home.

name: Milk powders: Dumex Step 1 & Pampers: Merries (Size M)
description: The family has a 5-months old child. Both parents are currently working part-time to pay for the daily household expenses. Mother has to delay her full-time work plans, due to the caregiving arrangement of the child. The family will require assistance with the following items for her child: Milk powders: Dumex Step 1 & Pampers: Merries (Size M).

name: Pampers
description:
Young set of parents who are working hard to provide for their newborn by taking on 2 jobs daily even while facing health issues. They also have 2 other children below the age of 5.

Quantity: 1 month (3 packets)

name: milk powder
description: Family has 4 young children (aged 6,5, 4, 3) and husband is the sole breadwinner with low income. Wife is full-time caregiver for her children, 3 of them are autistic. Family struggles to buy milk-powder for the younger ones and needs help. Children can only consume COWHEAD milk powder and needs 6 tins (2.5kg) monthly.

name: MamyPoko Size L Diapers
description: Family has 3 young children at home, with mother caring for youngest baby and not working. Father is working odd job and their assistance will only come in late November/early December.

name: Dumex Mamilgold Stage 3
description: Family has 3 young children at home, with mother caring for youngest baby and not working. Father is working odd job and their assistance will only come in late November/early December.

name: S26 Gold Progress Stage 3 (6 packs)
description: Low-income family with three children, father sole breadwinner with low-paying job, struggling to afford milk and diapers for 1 year old baby.

name: Family require 4 tins of Similac Stage 1 Total Comfort
description: This is a family of 5 with a sole breadwinner providing for 3 young children below 7 years old and 1 infant. With the high costs for children's basic necessities, they would benefit from donors who can kindly assist with diapers and milk powder.

name: Merries Pants Diapers (size L and size XL)
description: Low-income family of 2 young children, 10 mths and 2 years old, require diapers for the children (L size and XL size). Wife is the sole breadwinner and spouse is unemployed due to LTVP. Any quantity is appreciated! The family is experiencing financial constraints due to the high expenses for the milk powders and diapers.

name: Diapers and Milk Powder for Families at Yishun
description: Families living at Yishun communities are currently in need of diapers and milk powders. 1.Drypers Diapers: Pull Up Pants and Tape Diapers (Size L, XL and XXL), 2. Milk powder: Dugro stage 1, 3 and 4, 900g Abbott Grow Toddler (1-3 years).We welcome whatever quantities that the donor wishes to donate. Please contact us for delivery details (Email: dik@childrensociety.org.sg, Contact No.: 9436 7401). *Note: Delivery costs will be covered by donors. Thank you for your kind donation!

name: Wardrobe
description: Single mother with 3 young children needs a new 4 door wardrobe. Their current wardrobe  is worn down and broken in parts (it could potentially fall down).

name: Kitchen Cabinet
description:
Client is a mother of 7 (F/15, F/9, F/8, M/7, F/5, F3, M/newborn). 
Client and her husband currently live in a 1-room-1-hall with F/9, F/8, M/7, F/5, F3, M/newborn. 
Client was previously unable to work due to gestational hypertension, and presently, she is the primary caregiver for the newborn. 
In addition, she underwent a cesarean section (c-section) when she gave birth on 30th August 2021, and is currently unable to do strenuous activities. Her husband is currently employed as a food delivery rider on a part time basis, working only for a few hours each night as he helps client out in the day. As such, the family are limited in their financial resources and are unable to fork out money to pay for a kitchen cabinet.

name: Queen Size Mattress With Bed Frame (Brand New Preferred)
description:
This is a nuclear family of four family members. 
The father of the household is permanently unfit for work due to chronic medical issues. 
He is wheel-chair bound and requires support for his regular dialysis visits and medical appointments. 
His wife is also temporarily unfit for work as she is recuperating from her foot infection and pain. 
They are dependent on Comcare assistance and thus, are unable to afford any big-ticket items. As such, we would like to request for the generous provision of a pre-loved queen-size bed frame and a new queen-size mattress for the family.
specifications: Bed frame can be pre-loved, but mattress preferred brand new due to bedbugs issues previously.

name: King-sized Mattress
description: Family consists of a single mother living with 4 children and 2 grandchildren in a rental flat. They require an immediate replacement of a king-sized mattress. In-kind donation of 1 brand-new mattress will be appreciated. Family requires brand new mattress due to sensitive skin conditon. Thank you.

name: wardrobe
description: Elderly couple living in a 1 room rental flat requires a 2-door wardrobe. Thank you.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Navarraj

name: Plastic Drawers
description:
We are requesting for a 2 sets of a 4 tier plastic drawers. 
Due to the increasing number of clients, tools (such as aprons) that clients are using will require a bigger and safer way to be kept. In addition, the drawers will help clients to have easy access to their tools for the day.

name: Double-decker bed
description: Grandmother and granddaughter staying together.  Grandmother is elderly and visually impaired.  Granddaughter is unable to work due to health reason.   Family needs a double decker bed as the old one broken.  Donor, pls look for worker Christopher

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Navarraj

name: Double decker bunk beds (2x)
description: Family of 6 with 4 children (age 14, 12, 10, 10) living in a 4-room flat. Family were previously Malaysia citizens and paying full unsubsidized school fees, hence their house furnitures were very old/ donated/ taken from recycling site. Requesting for double decker bunk beds for the children so as to give them some personal space. Appreciate delivery to be send to client house. Thank you!

name: 2 laptops
description: Family will have 3 primary sch-going children in 2022 and 2 in childcare. Family is having financial difficulties and is not able to afford laptops for children's HBL. School only loans out to client at $200+ which they cant afford.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bukit Panjang
contact.name: Nur Ashikin Binte Hazlan

name: Tablet
description: Family has 6 school-going children. 2nd youngest child requires a tablet to help with his school work on days with Home-Based Learning (HBL). Tablet preferred as there is not much space at home to accommodate another laptop. Father is working full-time as an ambulance driver but does not earn enough to buy a new tablet, while mother is a full-time caregiver.

name: Laptop
description: Family has 3 school-going children who requires a working laptop to help with their school work/assignments/home-based learning. Their current laptop is faulty. Both parents are unemployed.

name: Laptop
description: Family with single mother with 2 teenagers is a laptop for one of the children who will be moving on to tertiary education. They were previously homeless and had experienced living in the streets and moving from one house to another, due to family circumstances. The family has recently into their first temporary house that they could call their home. Preferred if donor can support with delivery fee as well and if can deliver directly to client's house.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Siti Raudhah Bte Azman

name: Laptop with MS office ( good condition)
description: Client is a single mother with three young children. She works full-time while managing care of the children, and her job requires her to submit reports that she requires using MS office on. She currently toggles between using her children’s laptop loaned from the school for their HBL, or borrowing from colleagues. However, this is not sustainable and creates inconvenience and delay in her submitting her work. Client is also the sole breadwinner of her family.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Janetta Tan

name: Laptop for Single-Mother for Upgrading Course
description: Single mother of 4 and 6yo child is seeking to improve herself through a 6 months course, such that she is able to seek out better employment to provide for her children. She requires a laptop to support her learning. Interested donor, please contact worker at shiyan@frcsfsc.sg or 8554-8219. Thank you very much

name: Wacom Intuos Tablet
description:
Young adult with mild ID is currently doing her part-time studies in digital animation at the ITE. She requires a tablet (Wacom Intuos) for her school work. 

Young adult is residing and taken care by her grandparents who are no longer working.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Lee Yan Jun

name: Laptop/Desktop
description:
Young adult with mild ID is currently doing her part-time studies in digital animation at the ITE. She requires a desktop/laptop for her school work.

Young adult is residing and taken care by her grandparents who are no longer working.

Min specifications required to support the necessary educational software:

Processor: Intel(R) Core (TM) i7-8550U CPU @ 1.80GHz 1.99 GHz
RAM: 16GB
System type: 64-bit operating system, x64-based processer
Software: Windows 10

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Lee Yan Jun

name: Laptop
description: Client is 70 years old and currently fostering 2 of her school going grand-nephews. Client would require an additional laptop as family currently only has 1 laptop, making it challenging for both children to attend HBL/online tuition at the same time. Appreciate it donors can bear delivery cost. Thank you!

name: A used laptop
description: A father who is serving the last stage of a sentence works at a halfway house. He had recently completed a computer course for beginners. He wishes to have a used laptop for him to practice the knowledge he learnt from the computer lesson. He has two teenage schooling children. One child with Nephrotic Syndrome requires life long medication for his health. His wife works as a stall assistant with irregular income. His maternal grandmother is staying at a nursing home. His mother is unemployed with health issues.

name: Handphone
description: A family comprising single mother and her 11y/o son living in a 2-room rental flat is requesting for a handphone. Thank you very much.

name: Handphone
description: Beneficiary living in a 2-room rental flat (family of 6) is requesting for a handphone. Thank you very much.

name: Hybrid mountain bike with gears
description: The client is struggling with his mental health and finds it difficult to leave the house. However, he finds it less intimidating to leave his home on a bicycle. Riding the bicycle not only brings him from one point to another but it also helps him to better cope with his mental health. Interested donors kindly write in to reubenyue@carecorner.org.sg

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Admiralty
contact.name: Juanna Sia
